meta.article_title: January 27, 2014 - Practicing Serves the Productive Way

debutant.nom: Visualize the serve in your head
debutant.description: See the entire trajectory of the serve and the contact you want to make with the ball, then let go and let the subconscious take over.

exercices_complementaires.description: Start by visualizing the serve in your head, then practice serving without trying to guide it.

metriques_progression.description: Pay attention to whether your serves are going as planned, and make adjustments as needed.
